item.title: Power Rankings: Can Texas exact revenge and snap LSU's win streak?
item.description: The Tigers seek to sweep a key series in the SEC, but the Longhorns look to avenge their loss in Baton Rouge from last month.

item.title: Bracketology: Duke returns to top 16, Princeton suffers biggest slide
item.description: The Blue Devils, up one line to a No. 4 seed, have won 13 straight games and sit atop the ACC.

item.title: Road to $1M paydays: How WNBA salaries evolved with each CBA
item.description: For the first time, a $1 million base salary is expected in the new WNBA CBA, and the cap could see a 230% increase.

item.title: NBA trade buzz: Live updates and intel during deadline week
item.description: Chris Paul is headed to Toronto, but will he stay there? Catch up on what we're hearing from insiders.

item.title: Sources: Mavs overhaul again, trade AD to Wiz
item.description: The Mavericks are trading 10-time All-Star Anthony Davis to the Wizards as part of an eight-player trade, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania.
